product_name: Petzl Barrettes Long Linking Crampon Bars
long_description: Use the curved Petzl Barrettes Long Linking Crampon bars to allow your Petzl crampons (sold separately) to accommodate European boot sizes 41 - 50 (US men's 8 - 15).
short_description: Use the curved Petzl Barrettes Long Linking Crampon bars to allow your Petzl crampons (sold separately) to accommodate European boot sizes 41 - 50 (US men's 8 - 15).
